titles.title: Combat Action Recognition and Evaluation (CARE) for Remotely Piloted Aircraft (RPA) Crews Act of 2025
Combat Action Recognition and Evaluation (CARE) for Remotely Piloted Aircraft (RPA) Crews Act of 2025
A bill to provide a combat status identifier equivalent for remotely piloted aircraft crew who conduct combat operations.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Armed Services.
